name: Match Winning Diary
caption: Every run took forever, but hey—who’s counting when you’ve got style? This diary holds all my “slow and steady” victories.

name: Appeal First Bag
caption: When in doubt, shout first and ask questions later—reviews are for the brave. Carry your misplaced confidence wherever you go.

name: Don't Really See Cap
caption: Why watch replays when you can just guess and hope for the best? This cap is for the bold, not the accurate.

name: Golden Duck Trophy
caption: Here’s to the quickest way to break hearts and expectations alike. Celebrate your flawless failure with pride.

name: Participation Medal
caption: You showed up, survived the carnage, and that’s worth a medal. Because sometimes just being there counts as winning.

name: Stat Padding Certificate
caption: Congrats on stopping the team from crossing 200 runs—true stat-padding mastery. Proof that sometimes holding back is an art.

name: Did I Cook Tee
caption: Spent more time than runs on the scoreboard, but confidence was at an all-time high. Turns out, cooking takes patience—and lots of waiting.

name: Strike Rate Tee
caption: Why rush when you can stroll and still call it innings? Patience is just slow aggression with better PR.
